ValidationRule.description: Req #3287 Opportunity record type change from direct to indirect
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Pre_opportunity', OR( AND( ISCHANGED( RecordTypeId ), OR( AND( RecordTypeId = $Label.Indirect_Opportunity, PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId )= $Label.Direct_Opportunity ) , AND( PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId )= $Label.Indirect_Opportunity, RecordTypeId = $Label.Direct_Opportunity ) ), NOT( OR( $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name = 'Data Loader Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Admin Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Global Process Admin Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Sales Ops Profile', $User.Id = OwnerId, CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'Regional Sales Lead'), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'Partner Sales Manager') ) ) ), AND( ISCHANGED( RecordTypeId ), NOT( OR(RecordTypeId = $Label.Indirect_Opportunity, RecordTypeId = $Label.Direct_Opportunity) ), NOT( OR( $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name = 'Data Loader Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Admin Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Global Process Admin Profile' ) ) ), AND( OR( AND( PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId )= $Label.Read_Only_Direct_Opportunity_Record_Type, OR( RecordTypeId = $Label.Direct_Opportunity, RecordTypeId = $Label.Indirect_Opportunity, RecordTypeId = $Label.Pre_Sales_Risk_Opportunity ) ), AND( OR( RecordTypeId = $Label.Direct_Opportunity, RecordTypeId = $Label.Indirect_Opportunity, RecordTypeId = $Label.Pre_Sales_Risk_Opportunity ), PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId )= $Label.Read_Only_InDirect_Opportunity_Record_Type ) ),
ISCHANGED( RecordTypeId ), NOT( OR(
$Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name = 'Data Loader Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Admin Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Global Process Admin Profile'))
),
AND( ISCHANGED( RecordTypeId ), OR( PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId) = $Label.Indirect_Opportunity, PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId )= $Label.Direct_Opportunity ), RecordTypeId = $Label.Pre_Sales_Risk_Opportunity, NOT( OR( $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name = 'Data Loader Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Admin Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Global Process Admin Profile' ) ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Partner Sales Manager, Regional Sales Lead, Oppty Owner or Sales Ops Profile can change Oppty Record Type. Only Type from Direct to Indirect & Indirect to Direct can be changed, till G3 Facilitator is notified. Otherwise, please create a new oppty.
